channel.title: Projects on Roberta Rosa Valtorta
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Roberta Rosa Valtorta

item.title: Biological dehumanization and its correlates
item.description: Biological dehumanization (or biologization) is a form of dehumanization in which others are perceived as viruses and contagious entities rather than human beings. The present line of research explores this phenomenon by investigating its antecedents and consequences through correlational and experimental studies.
